dialogueSegments.text: Here you go Alan! Thank you so much for waiting!
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: It tastes pretty good. Thank you for going out of your way to get the ingredients. I really appreciate it.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan

dialogueSegments.text: I’m happy you enjoyed the coffee. Let me know if you ever want another.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Chef

dialogueSegments.text: I think I’ll take you up on that sometime. Thanks Chef. I’ll see you later.
dialogueSegments.speaker: Alan
